meanings.sent1: The sign clearly prohibits smoking in this area.
meanings.sent2: The law prohibits parking in front of the fire hydrant.
meanings.sent3: The grumpy cat prohibits any attempts at petting.
meanings.sent4: Her strict diet prohibits any indulgence in sweets.
meanings.sent5: The school rule prohibits running in the hallways to ensure safety.

meanings.sent1: Wearing a helmet can prohibit head injuries while biking.
meanings.sent2: Heavy rain can prohibit outdoor activities like picnics.
meanings.sent3: The tangled wires prohibit the smooth flow of electricity.
meanings.sent4: Lack of sleep can prohibit clear thinking and decision-making.
meanings.sent5: The closed road prohibits any passage through the construction zone.
